units.title: Inhibitor treatment of organoids
units.text: were treated with inhibitors to either NOTCH (DBZ or DAPT) or WNT (IWP-2 or XAV939) upon initiation of hormonal stimulation.
units.rationale: Describes the experimental step of adding specific pathway inhibitors during hormone exposure.

units.title: Omission of RSPO-1 in WNT inhibition condition
units.text:
R-spondin-1 (RSPO-1) was omitted from ExM in the presence of WNT inhibitors.
IHC for acetylated Î±-tubulin (ciliary marker) and glycodelin (PAEP).
Collection time points for scRNA-seq are highlighted with asterisks.
units.rationale: Specifies a modification of the culture medium when WNT signaling is blocked.
